39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/solvers/pipeline_planner.h>
40 #include <moveit/task_constructor/task.h>
41 #include <moveit/planning_scene/planning_scene.h>
42 #include <moveit/planning_pipeline/planning_pipeline.h>

45 #include <eigen_conversions/eigen_msg.h>

47 namespace moveit {
48 namespace task_constructor {
49 namespace solvers {
50 
51 PipelinePlanner::PipelinePlanner() {
52  auto& p = properties();
53  p.declare<std::string>("planner", "", "planner id");
54 
55  p.declare<uint>("num_planning_attempts", 1u, "number of planning attempts");
56  p.declare<moveit_msgs::WorkspaceParameters>("workspace_parameters", moveit_msgs::WorkspaceParameters(),
57  "allowed workspace of mobile base?");
58 
59  p.declare<double>("goal_joint_tolerance", 1e-4, "tolerance for reaching joint goals");
60  p.declare<double>("goal_position_tolerance", 1e-4, "tolerance for reaching position goals");
61  p.declare<double>("goal_orientation_tolerance", 1e-4, "tolerance for reaching orientation goals");
62 
63  p.declare<bool>("display_motion_plans", false,
64  "publish generated solutions on topic " + planning_pipeline::PlanningPipeline::DISPLAY_PATH_TOPIC);
65  p.declare<bool>("publish_planning_requests", false,
66  "publish motion planning requests on topic " +
67  planning_pipeline::PlanningPipeline::MOTION_PLAN_REQUEST_TOPIC);
68 }
69 
70 PipelinePlanner::PipelinePlanner(const planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr& planning_pipeline) : PipelinePlanner() {
71  planner_ = planning_pipeline;
72 }
73 
74 void PipelinePlanner::init(const core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
75  if (!planner_) {
76  planner_ = Task::createPlanner(robot_model);
77  } else if (robot_model != planner_->getRobotModel()) {
78  throw std::runtime_error(
79  "The robot model of the planning pipeline isn't the same as the task's robot model -- "
80  "use Task::setRobotModel for setting the robot model when using custom planning pipeline");
81  }
82  planner_->displayComputedMotionPlans(properties().get<bool>("display_motion_plans"));
83  planner_->publishReceivedRequests(properties().get<bool>("publish_planning_requests"));
84 }
85 
86 void initMotionPlanRequest(moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest& req, const PropertyMap& p,
87  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg, double timeout) {
88  req.group_name = jmg->getName();
89  req.planner_id = p.get<std::string>("planner");
90  req.allowed_planning_time = timeout;
91  req.start_state.is_diff = true; // we don't specify an extra start state
92 
93  req.num_planning_attempts = p.get<uint>("num_planning_attempts");
94  req.max_velocity_scaling_factor = p.get<double>("max_velocity_scaling_factor");
95  req.max_acceleration_scaling_factor = p.get<double>("max_acceleration_scaling_factor");
96  req.workspace_parameters = p.get<moveit_msgs::WorkspaceParameters>("workspace_parameters");
97 }
98 
99 bool PipelinePlanner::plan(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& from,
100  const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& to, const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg,
101  double timeout, robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr& result,
102  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints) {
103  const auto& props = properties();
104  moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest req;
105  initMotionPlanRequest(req, props, jmg, timeout);
106 
107  req.goal_constraints.resize(1);
108  req.goal_constraints[0] = kinematic_constraints::constructGoalConstraints(to->getCurrentState(), jmg,
109  props.get<double>("goal_joint_tolerance"));
110  req.path_constraints = path_constraints;
111 
112  ::planning_interface::MotionPlanResponse res;
113  bool success = planner_->generatePlan(from, req, res);
114  result = res.trajectory_;
115  return success;
116 }
117 
118 bool PipelinePlanner::plan(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& from, const moveit::core::LinkModel& link,
119  const Eigen::Isometry3d& target_eigen, const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg,
120  double timeout, robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr& result,
121  const moveit_msgs::Constraints& path_constraints) {
122  const auto& props = properties();
123  moveit_msgs::MotionPlanRequest req;
124  initMotionPlanRequest(req, props, jmg, timeout);
125 
126  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped target;
127  target.header.frame_id = from->getPlanningFrame();
128  tf::poseEigenToMsg(target_eigen, target.pose);
129 
130  req.goal_constraints.resize(1);
131  req.goal_constraints[0] = kinematic_constraints::constructGoalConstraints(
132  link.getName(), target, props.get<double>("goal_position_tolerance"),
133  props.get<double>("goal_orientation_tolerance"));
134  req.path_constraints = path_constraints;
135 
136  ::planning_interface::MotionPlanResponse res;
137  bool success = planner_->generatePlan(from, req, res);
138  result = res.trajectory_;
139  return success;
140 }
141 } // namespace solvers
142 } // namespace task_constructor
143 } // namespace moveit
